org.jgrapht

Interface EdgeFactory<V,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the graph vertex type
    E - the graph edge type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassBasedEdgeFactory
    Deprecated. 
    Use suppliers instead

    @Deprecated
public interface EdgeFactory<V,E>
    An edge factory used by graphs for creating new edges.

    A graph uses the edge factory to create new edge objects whenever a user calls method Graph.addEdge(Object, Object). Users can also create the edge in user code and then use method Graph.addEdge(Object, Object, Object) to add the edge.

    Note that when used inside a Graph the edge factory must return unique objects on each call.

    Since:
    Jul 14, 2003
    Author:
    Barak Naveh

        a new edge whose endpoints are the specified source and target vertices.
